name: One Jump Man (Wylter)
description:
You are One Jump Man, and you must finish this platformer... but be resourceful, cause you only have 1 jump for each level!

Commands:

WASD to MOVE

SPACE to JUMP

"R" to RESET

Notes:

If you notice inconsistency with the clouds destruction animation, it might be a problem with your browser. If you really like the game, give the .exe a try :)

Credits:

Davide "Wylter" Di Bernardo (Programmer, Game Designer)

Giovanni Carnovale (Audio Designer, Composer,  Graphic Designer)
